pic1_alt: Default ggplot2 scatterplot of relationship between number of members in a household and number of items owned, color coded by village - Chirodzo, God and Ruaca. There's a linear relationship between number of members in household and number of items owned.
pic2_alt: Faceted plot of bar charts for percent of respondents in each village who owned each item. Items are bicycle, cow cart, cow plough, mobile phone, motorcycle, radio, solar panel, solar torch, table, television, and no items listed. Bar chart for each village, Chirodzo, God and Ruaca.
